languages.text: {n}Чем ближе вы подходите к дознавателю, тем больше ожесточается холод: руки сводит судорогой, пальцы кривятся в спазме, а кожа на лице начинает идти жгучей изморозью. Задыхаясь от холода, на негнущихся ногах, вы все же приближаетесь к Хейнриксу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Чем ближе вы подходите к дознавателю, тем больше ожесточается холод: руки сводит судорогой, пальцы кривятся в спазме, а кожа на лице начинает идти жгучей изморозью. Задыхаясь от холода, на негнущихся ногах, вы все же приближаетесь к Хейнриксу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чем ближе вы подходите к дознавателю, тем больше ожесточается холод: руки сводит судорогой, пальцы кривятся в спазме, а кожа на лице начинает идти жгучей изморозью. Задыхаясь от холода, на негнущихся ногах, вы все же приближаетесь к Хейнриксу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

{n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

{n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

{n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你越是靠近海因里希，冰寒就越是强烈。你的手开始颤抖，手指抽起了筋，脸上不断蔓延的冰霜也开始灼烧着你的皮肤。你被寒意冻得喘不过气来，但你还是强忍着僵硬的双腿，踉踉跄跄地朝海因里希走去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你越是靠近海因里希，冰寒就越是强烈。你的手开始颤抖，手指抽起了筋，脸上不断蔓延的冰霜也开始灼烧着你的皮肤。你被寒意冻得喘不过气来，但你还是强忍着僵硬的双腿，踉踉跄跄地朝海因里希走去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuanto más te acercas a Heinrix, más intenso es el frío. Tus manos empiezan a temblar, tus dedos se agarrotan y la piel de tu cara empieza a arder al cubrirse de escarcha. Jadeando por el frío, obligas a tus rígidas piernas a avanzar hacia Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuanto más te acercas a Heinrix, más intenso es el frío. Tus manos empiezan a temblar, tus dedos se agarrotan y la piel de tu cara empieza a arder al cubrirse de escarcha. Jadeando por el frío, obligas a tus rígidas piernas a avanzar hacia Heinrix.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたがハインリックスに近づくにつれて、寒さはより厳しいものとなっていく…手が震え、指が痙攣し、顔の皮膚に霜が降りて火照り始める。寒さに喘ぎながら、あなたは硬直した足を無理やり動かして、ハインリックスの方によろめきながら向かう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがハインリックスに近づくにつれて、寒さはより厳しいものとなっていく…手が震え、指が痙攣し、顔の皮膚に霜が降りて火照り始める。寒さに喘ぎながら、あなたは硬直した足を無理やり動かして、ハインリックスの方によろめきながら向かう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plus vous vous approchez d'Heinrix, plus le froid s'intensifie. Vos mains se mettent à trembler, vos doigts se tétanisent et votre visage couvert de givre commence à vous brûler. Le souffle coupé par le froid, vous forcez vos jambes raides à avancer vers l'interrogateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus vous vous approchez d'Heinrix, plus le froid s'intensifie. Vos mains se mettent à trembler, vos doigts se tétanisent et votre visage couvert de givre commence à vous brûler. Le souffle coupé par le froid, vous forcez vos jambes raides à avancer vers l'interrogateur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je weiter du dich Heinrix näherst, desto kälter wird es – deine Hände fangen an zu zittern, deine Finger verkrampfen sich und dein Gesicht beginnt zu brennen, da sich der Frost darauf ausbreitet. Vor Kälte nach Luft ringend bringst du deine steifen Beine dazu, in Richtung Heinrix zu taumeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je weiter du dich Heinrix näherst, desto kälter wird es – deine Hände fangen an zu zittern, deine Finger verkrampfen sich und dein Gesicht beginnt zu brennen, da sich der Frost darauf ausbreitet. Vor Kälte nach Luft ringend bringst du deine steifen Beine dazu, in Richtung Heinrix zu taumeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'e yaklaştıkça soğuğun yoğunluğu da artıyor. Üzerinde yayılan donla birlikte ellerin titremeye, parmaklarına kramp girmeye ve yüz derin yanmaya başlıyor. Soğukta nefes almaya çalışırken Heinrix'e ulaşmak için kaskatı kesilen bacaklarını zorluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The closer you move toward Heinrix, the more the cold intensifies — your hands begin to shake, your fingers cramp, and the skin of your face begins to burn as frost spreads across it. Gasping from the cold, you force your stiffening legs to stagger toward Heinrix.{/n}
